snippet.title: Those Who Crawl - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming soon to Itch.io and Steam
(VR version coming soon)

As you progressed through the cave tunnels, they slowly tightened until you could not even stand. Now, as you crawl, you wonder if you are not alone in the darkness.

Those Who Crawl is a short but tense PC  horror game about crawling and climbing through tunnels. The game is about a half-hour long and features AI monsters, environmental hazards, climbing, and crawling.
